message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CE, cs.CV 

The paper proposes an approach for improving the performance of contextual bandit in a setting where an unlabeled history of contexts is available for pre-training. This involves adaptive, dynamic representation learning, which combines offline pre-training with online selection and modification of embedding functions. The paper is likely to be relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computational linguistics (cs.CL), computer vision (cs.CV), and computer engineering (cs.CE).
